application_details: Crown's refusal to grant a business license due to a management plan prohibiting summer gondola operations
procedure_followed: Crown moved to strike the plaintiff's statement of claim, dismissed by prothonotary, Crown appealed but appeal was dismissed
decision_reasoning: Claim is not a disguised attack on an administrative decision; it depends on breach of contractual obligations
result_of_case: Appeal dismissed; plaintiff's claim can proceed as a breach of contract case
relevant_rule: A claim sounding in breach of contract can proceed if it does not depend on the invalidity of an administrative decision
